name: SPANATIX
overview:
Spanatix is a web-based social network platform geared towards dedicated sports fans (Sports + Fanatics).

Users connect through their personalized â€œSportsRoomâ€ which provides information on their favorite teams and athletes and allows them to engage with other users based on their shared interests. The platform is designed as the end-all, one-stop social network for a sports fanatic to get his or her sports fix.

FanMeter, Spanatixâ€™s signature game application, is a fun and interactive way for sport fans to use their knowledge of sports, players and match conditions to make an educated decision on predicting the outcome of games. The signature feature of the game -Bragometer - uses an advanced algorithm to rank all the users on FanMeter by several factors, including winning percent, game complexity and number of wins.

Users can join and play for free through their Facebook Page or sign up for an account at spanatix.com. Each user has the ability to share their Bragometer results through various social media platforms, including Facebook and Spanatix. Users can also keep track of their favorite teamsâ€™ news, events and fans with the same interest.
